title: Vodafone Finance Chief Margherita Della Valle: “I Want To See More Female CFOs” - Forbes
content: Vodafone Finance Chief Margherita Della Valle: “I Want To See More Female CFOs”  Forbes
description: Vodafone CFO Margherita Della Valle has started NXT Gen Women in Finance to provide mentoring for some of her profession’s brightest stars. In this Q&A, she explains why.
